coded_answer.p: Dear Manager: I am Angela Ounis and I am writtingwriting to you because I went to see 'Over the Rainbow', London's newest and best musical show. I am very disappointingdisappointed atby this evening's show. First of all, the starringstars that waswere supposed to be there (Danny Brook and Tina Truelove) weren't there,. I was so enthusiastic about your starringstars, when I realized was a failurethey had been replaced, even though theythe replacements dodidwere good, it wasn't the same. I arrived there, at 19:15, the. The show was supposed to start at 19.30, but started at 20:15, it. It cannot be possible that a schedule for a show can have had a big changebe changed that much. You go there to see a show and have a good time, not to wait foreverfor ever untilfor what you want. Also it was said that Discounts willwould be available, but I didn't receivedreceive any discount as you were cheating us. I know that you have a big responsabilityresponsibility but if you toldhave told something to people, dostick to it. On the other handAlso, the theatre Restaurant was closed because they've got a problem with the schedule's organization. That was so uncomfortableunpleasant, people waswere starving. I am so disappointed with this, that I am in all my rightwithin my rights to ask for some money back, your theatre show wasn't what was expected. Please let me know . sincerely yours
How has modern technology changed your daily life?

I am 17 years old, and my life has been very normal. Since I've gotI got a computer with a connection to the Internet, my social life has changed. Now I have more friends and I have more fun. This has helped me a lot, because I can talk with my friends thatwho are livinglive in other countries.

TechnologyComputers hashave a lot of programs that leadhelp you communicate with others in aan more easyeasier way. 'Speak Freely' is fantastic, you don't pay and you can hear the voice of the one you miss. This has opened another world to me, distances aren't so sad, they are more closeclosershorter.

I have learned a lot with the Internet, it. It gavesgives me the posibilitypossibilityopportunity to know more about things I've never knewI never knew about. It is incredible how it opens up to you another reality, a different view of life.
Now I have a different style of lifelifestyle, I am more open to the world's problems and progress. I am interestinginterested in reading articles and developing myself.

Technology had gavehas given me another life, it has helped me. My knowledge has been developed and also my life stylelifestyle. I think that modern technology is our future, we don't have to depend on it, but we have to work for athe biggest improvement.
